Thanks to the following people for their helpful support, criticisms, comments, contributions, etc.:

Original Soundtrack by Matthias Le Bidan. The Pathological logo was designed by Carrie Bloomfield. Board designs were contributed by Mike Brenneman and Kim Gignac. Intro screen map layout by Alex Gignac. In-game graphics partially based on artwork by Mike Brenneman.
If you like this game, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? Thanks for your support!
Turn the wheel to let marbles in. Four matching marbles will clear the wheel.
Swipe to release a marble. And make sure the other wheel is ready to receive it!
Great job! You completed a wheel! Now complete the other wheel to finish the level.
